data.name: Animal Doctor - Digital Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description: Animal Doctor’s digital Supporter Pack gives you access to various digital goodies and expands your game experience with exclusive content, such as beautiful tunes directly from the game as well as a video interview with an animal lover and her horses, Mr. Chips and Mrs. Chance, which also includes interesting questions to a veterinarian. In addition, you will receive a beautifully crafted digital map, a wallpaper and a quickstart guide that will make your start in the game easier.
data.about_the_game: Animal Doctor’s digital Supporter Pack gives you access to various digital goodies and expands your game experience with exclusive content, such as beautiful tunes directly from the game as well as a video interview with an animal lover and her horses, Mr. Chips and Mrs. Chance, which also includes interesting questions to a veterinarian. In addition, you will receive a beautifully crafted digital map, a wallpaper and a quickstart guide that will make your start in the game easier.
data.short_description: Animal Doctor’s digital Supporter Pack gives you access to various digital goodies and expands your game experience with exclusive content,
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10, x64
  • Processor: Intel i5 (4th Generation) or equivalent AMD, min. 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 560 TI / AMD Radeon HD 6970, min. 2GB VRAM, Shader Model 5.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10, x64, 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 (5th Generation) or equivalent AMD, min. 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon RX 570, min. 4GB VRAM, Shader Model 5.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
